title: I’m Not Going Your Way
lyrics:
This is an unreleased song from 2017, a ballad with a simple piano accompaniment, with a Country and Weston flavour.
I'm not going your way
But I don't want to take a leap of faith
We come from a different place
And the road ahead makes me so afraid
When you disappear from view
I don't know what I will do
I'm never gonna look behind me
You could find me if you wanted to
I've never been so dislocated
How I hated that I had to choose
Come to me
Come to me
I'm not going your way
I guess I lost a friend at the journey's end
This is the price you pay
For giving your heart to a new cliche
When you disappear from viеw
I don't know what I will do
I'm never gonna look behind mе
You could find me if you wanted to
I've never been so dislocated
How I hated that I had to choose
Come to me
Come to me

Come to me
Come to me
Yeah
When you disappear from view
I don't know what I will do
I'm not going your way
I'm not going your way
